attributes.action: Make it illegal for drug traffickers to be brought back into this country through prisoner swap programmes.
attributes.additional_details: Drug traffickers are infinitely more dangerous than money swindlers and I have two human rights which Come into play here:  1.  To be protected from those who would wish to destroy my life with illegal drugs.  2.  To have taxes taken from me under threat of criminalisation used for my benefit and not to keep scumbag drug traffickers in levels of luxury they aspired to through the money they planned to make by trafficking drugs.
